artist: Artist: Lucas Kilian; Artist: After Barthel Beham
description: foreshortened lying down infant with a hourglass, URC; three skulls in various positions in a row, with a fourth skull above the leftmost two; other bones between skulls
markings: on back stamped in black: Franz Steiner (?--illegible)
signed: ULC in the print: K. / 1614 | URC in the print: MORS . OMNIA . AEQVAT]
title: Four Skulls and a Child ("Mors Omnia Aequat")
